name: DFC@Home
0:
”Alexa, set steam to warm up”
”Alexa, set steam to off”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to the new DFC@Home Smart Home Skill! 

This skill allows you to warm up and turn off your Steam in your SteamScape™ Deluxe by Delta or Mystix™ Transcendent Experience by Brizo. 

Simply tell Alexa "Alexa, set steam to warm up."

To start a preset, tell Alexa. "Alexa, set steam to [profile name] [preset name]. For example, if your profile name is "Julie" and your preset is called "Morning" then tell Alexa, "Alexa set steam to Julie Morning."

Requirements:

• Registered and activated SteamScape™ Deluxe by Delta, connected to WiFi
• Registered and activated Mystix™ Transcendent Experience by Brizo, connected to WiFi
• DFC@Home Mobile app
• Activated DFC@Home account linked to Alexa Skill
• Working WiFi connection
• Activated and operating Amazon Alexa
